      if (!window.PerformanceObserver) return;
      if (window.PerformanceLongTaskTiming) {

        g.o.observe({entryTypes:['longtask']});
      }

      g2.entries = [];
      g2.observer = new PerformanceObserver(function(l) {
        if (g2.callback) return g2.callback(l);
        g2.entries = g2.entries.concat(l.getEntries());
      });
      g2.observer.observe({entryTypes:['paint', 'mark']});

-->Unserviced<!-- /react-text --></a></div></section><section class="test-drive-section"><div class="TestDriveBookingFlow__root TestDriveBookingFlow__has-splash-image"><div class="TestDriveBookingFlow__splash-container"></div><div class="TestDriveBookingFlow__form-wrapper"><div class="TestDriveBookingFlow__form-container-2 TestDriveBookingFlow__education-container"><div class="TestDriveBookingFlow__education-header"><span><!-- react-text: 479 -->Schedule a free test drive at your <!-- /react-text --><span class="NoWrap__root">home or office</span></span></div><div class="TestDriveBookingFlow__footer"><div class="Carousel__root" style="height: 270px;"><div class="owl-carousel owl-loaded owl-drag"><div class="owl-stage-outer"><div class="owl-stage" style="-webkit-transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px); transition: 0s; -webkit-transition: 0s; width: 960px;"><div class="owl-item active" style="width: 320px;"><div class="TestDriveBookingFlow__footer-card TestDriveBookingFlow__footer-financing"><h2 class="TestDriveBookingFlow__footer-card-header">Love it? We’ll leave it with you</h2><p class="TestDriveBookingFlow__footer-card-content"><!-- react-text: 487 -->If you’re interested in the car, our friendly Concierge can help you buy it on the spot. Get preapproved online to make the transaction even faster and easier.<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 488 --> <!-- /react-text --><a href="/apply-to-finance?cid=c152495">Apply for financing</a></p></div></div><div class="owl-item" style="width: 320px;"><div class="TestDriveBookingFlow__footer-card TestDriveBookingFlow__footer-unsure"><h2 class="TestDriveBookingFlow__footer-card-header">Not quite sure yet? No pressure</h2><p class="TestDriveBookingFlow__footer-card-content">If you’ve changed your mind or need more time to think it over, we’ll just take the car back. We’ll deliver it for free if you decide to purchase it later.</p></div></div><div class="owl-item" style="width: 320px;"><div class="TestDriveBookingFlow__footer-card TestDriveBookingFlow__footer-trade-in"><h2 class="TestDriveBookingFlow__footer-card-header">Have a trade-in?</h2><p class="TestDriveBookingFlow__footer-card-content"><!-- react-text: 496 -->Get an extra <!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 497 -->$500<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 498 --> credit towards purchase when you trade-in a car during your first appointment.<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 499 --> <!-- /react-text --><a href="https://support.shift.com/hc/en-us/articles/115001649431-Can-I-trade-in-my-vehicle-with-Shift-" target="_blank">Learn more</a></p></div></div></div></div></div><ul class="Carousel__pager inline"><li class="Carousel__active-dot"></li><li class=""></li><li class=""></li></ul><div class="Carousel__arrow Carousel__arrow-right"><div class="Carousel__arrow-icon"></div></div></div></div><div class="TestDriveBookingFlow__education-button-container"><button class="Button__root Button__color-red Button__size-big Button__weight-normal" type="button"><span class="Button__content">Book a test drive</span></button></div></div></div></div></section><div class="CarProfile__faq-and-ask-form"><section class="CarProfile__faq"><div class="CarProfile__faq-title">Frequently Asked Questions</div><div class="FAQList__root"><div class="HorizontalRule__root FAQList__hr"></div><div class="FAQList__question-toggle ContentToggle__root"><div class="ContentToggle__link FAQList__question-link"><div class="ContentToggle__link-text">Are your prices negotiable?</div><div class="ContentToggle__arrow ContentToggle__arrow-gray FAQList__question-arrow"></div></div><div class="ContentToggle__content"><div><p>We love data. Our pricing is driven by data as we take into account what cars within the same parameters (year, make, model, trim, mileage) would sell around the area. Our prices are always below average dealership list prices. We don’t negotiate, up or down, and we’re very transparent about it all.</p><p>When pricing cars, our team takes into consideration the retail, auction, private party and other markets in any given region. If the price does ever drop, we’ll be sure to notify you, but cannot guarantee that the car will still be available in the future.</p></div></div></div><div class="HorizontalRule__root FAQList__hr"></div><div class="FAQList__question-toggle ContentToggle__root"><div class="ContentToggle__link FAQList__question-link"><div class="ContentToggle__link-text">Can I see multiple cars?</div><div class="ContentToggle__arrow ContentToggle__arrow-gray FAQList__question-arrow"></div></div><div class="ContentToggle__content"><p><!-- react-text: 530 -->If you are looking to compare multiple cars in Shift’s inventory, we invite you to come to our parking hub for your appointment so that you can see them both at the same time. To schedule one of these appointments, please call us at<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 531 --> <!-- /react-text --><a href="tel:+14159692679">415-969-2679</a><!-- react-text: 533 -->.<!-- /react-text --></p></div></div><div class="HorizontalRule__root FAQList__hr"></div><div class="FAQList__question-toggle ContentToggle__root"><div class="ContentToggle__link FAQList__question-link"><div class="ContentToggle__link-text">Is this car still available?</div><div class="ContentToggle__arrow ContentToggle__arrow-gray FAQList__question-arrow"></div></div><div class="ContentToggle__content"><p>Our website is updated live. As long as the car is not listed as “Coming Soon”, “Sale Pending”, or “Sold” it is available for test drives.</p></div></div><div class="HorizontalRule__root FAQList__hr"></div><div class="FAQList__question-toggle ContentToggle__root"><div class="ContentToggle__link FAQList__question-link"><div class="ContentToggle__link-text">Does Shift provide warranties?</div><div class="ContentToggle__arrow ContentToggle__arrow-gray FAQList__question-arrow"></div></div><div class="ContentToggle__content"><p><!-- react-text: 548 -->Every Shift Certified car comes with a 30-day limited warranty and a 5-day return guarantee.<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 549 --> <!-- /react-text --><span><!-- react-text: 551 -->In addition to the included warranty, Shift offers vehicle protection plans that safeguard you from the unexpected costs of car ownership. Our protection plans are backed by industry-leading partners and provide total coverage against many mechanical and electrical problems you may face.<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 552 --> <!-- /react-text --><a href="/protection">Learn more</a></span></p></div></div><div class="HorizontalRule__root FAQList__hr"></div><div class="FAQList__question-toggle ContentToggle__root"><div class="ContentToggle__link FAQList__question-link"><div class="ContentToggle__link-text">Do I need an appointment?</div><div class="ContentToggle__arrow ContentToggle__arrow-gray FAQList__question-arrow"></div></div><div class="ContentToggle__content"><p><!-- react-text: 561 -->Yes! To ensure your vehicle is available and a driver is assigned to you, we require booking a test drive appointment in advance.<!-- /react-text --><!-- react-text: 562 --> <!-- /react-text --><a href="#">Book your test drive today!</a></p></div></div><div class="HorizontalRule__root FAQList__hr"></div></div><div class="CarProfile__faq-more"><a href="https://support.shift.com/hc/en-us" target="_blank">See full FAQ</a></div></section><section class="CarProfile__question-wrapper"><form class="ModelForm__root CarProfilePageQuestionForm__root"><div to the used car market. Our goal is to turn what is universally regarded as a burdensome life event into a delightful experience.</p><p>© Shift Technologies, Inc.</p></div></div><div class="column"><div class="two-column-layout"><div class="column not-for-mobile"><nav><ul><li><a href="/home">Browse cars</a></li><li><a href="/buy">How it works</a></li><li><a href="/sell-my-car">Sell your car</a></li><li><a href="/about">About Shift</a></li><li><a href="/drive-local">Drive Local</a></li><li><a href="/concierges">Concierges</a></li><li><a href="/engineering">Engineering</a></li><li><a href="/careers">Careers</a></li><li><a href="https://blog.shift.com/?region=unserviced">Blog</a></li><li><a href="https://support.shift.com">Support</a></li><li><a href="/terms" rel="nofollow">Terms and Privacy</a></li></ul></nav></div><div class="column"><ul class="social"><li class="email"><a href="mailto:support@shift.com">support@shift.com</a></li><li class="facebook"><a href="http://www.facebook.com/shiftcars" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">Facebook</a></li><li class="twitter"><a href="https://twitter.com/driveshift" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">Twitter</a></li><li class="linkedin"><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/shift-technologies-inc" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">LinkedIn</a></li><li class="press"><a href="mailto:press@shift.com">Press Inquiries</a></li><li class="angellist"><a href="https://angel.co/shift" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">angel.co/shift</a></li></ul><p class="for-mobile">© Shift Technologies, Inc.</p></div><div class="clear"></div></div></div><div class="clear"></div></div></div></footer></div></div></div></div></div></div>
